Combat Notes:
Aura Of Depravity: DR 5/good
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Two-handed Weapon With Buckler Penalty: -1 attack and AC
Unholy Champion: DR 10/good
Alignment Channel (Law): May use Channel Energy to heal or harm lawful outsiders
Aura Of Cowardice: R10' Foes suffer -4 vs. fear and lose immunity to fear
Aura Of Depravity: R10' Foes suffer -4 saves vs. compulsion
Aura Of Despair (Antipaladin): R10' Foes suffer -2 on all saves
Aura Of Sin: Self weapons and R10' attacks are considered evil for overcoming DR
Aura Of Vengeance: R10' May expend 2 Smite Good uses to grant Smite Good to all allies; must be used w/in 1 rd; bonuses last 1 min
Elemental Channel (Earth): May use Channel Energy to heal or harm Earth outsiders
Fiendish Weapon: May add 6 enhancements and properties to a weapon for 20 min 4/dy
Lookout: When an adjacent ally has this feat, may take move and standard actions in the surprise round if both self and ally can act; if only ally can act, self gains a surprise round action after ally
Smite Good: May gain +2 attack, +20 HP damage, bypass DR, and +2 AC vs. chosen good foe (+40 HP on first hit vs. outsider, dragon, cleric, or paladin) 7/dy
Save: Fortitude: +18; Reflex: +11; Will: +15

Deft Dodger: +1 Reflex
Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +2
Resilient: +1 Fortitude
Unholy Resilience: +2 Fortitude/+2 Reflex/+2 Will
Wisdom Will Adjustment: +1
Plague Bringer: Immune to effects of disease
Magic
Spell Slots: Antipaladin1: 5; Antipaladin2: 5; Antipaladin3: 3; Antipaladin4: 3 Spell DC: Antipaladin: 12
Spells:
Banishment (Unholy Champion7 Abju): R75' 40 HD extraplanar creatures in 15' radius banished from plane (DC 19 Will neg)
Bestow Curse (Cruelty3 Necr): Touched permanently suffers self choice of -6 ability, -4 attack, saves, and checks, or 50% chance/rd of losing action (DC 22 Will neg)
Contagion (Cruelty3 Necr): Touched contracts random disease (DC 22 Fort neg)
Detect Good (Detect Good1 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on good auras for conc or 200 min
Poison (Cruelty4 Necr): Touched suffers -1d3 Constitution/rd for 6 rd (DC 22 Fort neg)
Summon Monster IX (Fiendish Servant9 Conj): R75' 1 9th-, 1d3 8th-, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures appear and fight foes for 20 rd
Magic Notes:
Charisma Antipaladin Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level Antipaladin1, Antipaladin2
Charisma Channel Energy Adjustment: +2
Channel Energy: R30' May heal or inflict 10d6 HP (DC 22 Will half) 5/dy
Channel Negative Energy: May expend 2 Touch Of Corruption uses to use Channel Energy effects
Cruelty: Touch Of Corruption inflicts choice of blinded for 20 rd, cursed as Bestow Curse, dazed for 1 rd, deafened for 20 rd, diseased as Contagion, exhausted, fatigued, frightened for 10 rd, nauseated for 6 rd, paralyzed for 1 rd, poisoned as Poison, shaken for 20 rd, sickened for 20 rd, staggered for 10 rd, stunned for 5 rd (DC 22 Fort neg)
Detect Good: May use Detect Good effects at will
Fiendish Servant: May use Summon Monster IX effects to permanently summon an advanced chaotic evil creature or fiendish animal w/SR 31
Maximize Spell: May use +3 spell slot to maximize all variable effects on chosen spell
Shielded Caster: +4 concentration when an adjacent ally has this feat and no shield, +5 w/a buckler or light shield, +6 w/a heavy or tower shield/Suffer half concentration DC from foe Disruptive or similar feature
Touch Of Corruption: Touch inflicts 10d6 HP w/out provoking AOO or heals undead 12/dy
Unholy Champion: Channel Negative Energy and Touch Of Corruption effects maximized/Smite Good inflicts Banishment effects
